name: Field Day (itch) (Glass Robot Games, Moose)
description:
📣📣📣 Today's the big day! In one corner, there stands the endless team of bullies known simply as the Weeds! They may not be green but they are mean, and they'll stop at nothing to dominate your home turf. But on this side of the court and under your command, you've got as many rookies as you need called the Roots!! They've got the pluck, a lot of heart, but they're nothing without your determined coaching.

Root your soldiers into the ground surrounding the random paths that the Weeds might take and don't let them score any kick-goal-point-baskets! 🏈🏑⚽ Time to show these Weeds who's the real boss RIGHT HERE, RIGHT NOW ON FIELD DAY!!

------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

Press "A" to Select an "Attack" Character and then Left-Mouse Button (LMB) to drop them on the Field for $25.00

Press "S" to Select a "Slow 'Em Down" Character and then Left-Mouse Button (LMB) to drop them on the Field for $50.00

Press "D" and then Left-Mouse Button (LMB) to "Take a Character off the Field"

Right-Mouse Button (RMB) = Cancel the Action that you Selected
